00020 RobotData::RobotData(const RobotData& rhs) : WorldObject(rhs), robot_(rhs.robot_), type_(rhs.type_), status_(rhs.status_) {
00021     if(rhs.acceleration_) {
00022         this->acceleration_.reset(new Vector3d(*rhs.acceleration_));
00023     }
00024     if(rhs.coordinate_system_axis_.get<0>()) {
00025         this->coordinate_system_axis_.get<0>().reset(new Vector3d(*rhs.coordinate_system_axis_.get<0>()));
00026     }
00027     if(rhs.coordinate_system_axis_.get<1>()) {
00028         this->coordinate_system_axis_.get<1>().reset(new Vector3d(*rhs.coordinate_system_axis_.get<1>()));
00029     }
00030     if(rhs.coordinate_system_axis_.get<2>()) {
00031         this->coordinate_system_axis_.get<2>().reset(new Vector3d(*rhs.coordinate_system_axis_.get<2>()));
00032     }
00033     if(rhs.velocity_) {
00034         this->velocity_.reset(new Vector3d(*rhs.velocity_));
00035     }
00036 }

00072 boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> RobotData::extrapolated_position(double timesteps) const {
00073     boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> next_position(new Vector3d());
00074     // the next lines compute the new position by formula: s(t) = v*t + 1/2 * a * t^2
00075     next_position->insert_element(kXCoord,
00076                                   position()(0) + timesteps * velocity()(0) + 0.5*acceleration()(0)*timesteps*timesteps);
00077     next_position->insert_element(kYCoord,
00078                                   position()(1) + timesteps * velocity()(1) + 0.5*acceleration()(1)*timesteps*timesteps);
00079     next_position->insert_element(kZCoord,
00080                                   position()(2) + timesteps * velocity()(2) + 0.5*acceleration()(2)*timesteps*timesteps);
00081     return next_position;
00082 }
00083 
00084 boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> RobotData::extrapolated_velocity(double timesteps) const {
00085     boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> next_velocity(new Vector3d());
00086     next_velocity->insert_element(kXCoord, velocity()(0) + timesteps * acceleration()(0));
00087     next_velocity->insert_element(kYCoord, velocity()(1) + timesteps * acceleration()(1));
00088     next_velocity->insert_element(kZCoord, velocity()(2) + timesteps * acceleration()(2));
00089     return next_velocity;
00090 }

00104 boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> RobotData::clone() const {
